Name: Google Maps Traffic Layer
Description: Raster of the real-time traffic congestion (I guess it is related to the average speed of vehicles). It would be nice to write a harvester that gets the color of each segment of street in Brussels and saves that in db.

Name: Operational Points (Stops) INFRABEL
Description: The operational points of the railway network in Belgium

Name: Line Sections INFRABEL
Description: Segmentation of the rail network according to the characteristics of the infrastructure and the possibilities of operation. This list includes the route and technical characteristics of the line sections. More precise than line SNCB

Name: Segments Infrabel
Description: The segments of the SNCB network in Belgium.

Name: Vehicle Speed
Description: The average speed of the vehicles of STIB/MIVB on a 20-second interval

Name: Vehicle Aggregated Speed
Description: The average speed of the vehicles of STIB/MIVB on a 10-minute interval

Name: Segments
Description: The segments of the STIB/MIVB network.

Name: Vehicle Distance
Description: This endpoint returns the distance of each vehicle since the last stop.

Name: Vehicle Position Lime
Description: The vehicle position of Lime in Brussels

Name: Vehicle Position Pony
Description: The vehicle position of Pony in Brussels

Name: Vehicle Position Dott
Description: The vehicle position of Dott in Brussels

Name: Vehicle Position Bolt
Description: The vehicle position of Bolt in Brussels

Name: Weather
Description: The environment component provides some information about the environment in Brussels. It uses OpenWeather data to provide the weather for Brussels. Another endpoint provides the air quality data for Brussels (provided by Irceline).
